description: Initializes system configuration by loading properties from configuration files
Loads module mappings from properties file to configure system modules
Creates an instance of the configured login authenticator for user authentication
Loads URL patterns from configuration file for request routing
Sets up file monitoring for configuration files to detect and apply changes
Loads and initializes the configured data access driver implementation
Initializes the caching system and associates cacheable objects
Gracefully stops the cache engine when system is shutting down
Initializes the search indexing system for content searching
Initializes scheduled job for sending post summary emails to users
Initializes POP3 email integration service for the forum
